UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Periplanetasin-4, a novel antimicrobial peptide from the cockroach, inhibits communications between mitochondria and vacuoles.
Literature.Author: Lee H, Hwang JS, Lee DG

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=5µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=5µM),Trichosporon beigelii KCTC 7707(MIC=2.5µM),Malassezia furfur KCTC 7744(MIC=5µM),Aspergillus fumigatus KCTC 6145(MIC=10µM),Aspergillus flavus KCTC 6905(MIC=5µM)
